## TocEventItemDetails interface

Details about each DOM element transformed during the operation of the `toc` action

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TocEventItemDetails 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [anchor?](./toc.toceventitemdetails.anchor.md) |  | HTMLAnchorElement | <i>(Optional)</i> The anchor element inserted by the <code>toc</code> action unless the <code>anchored</code> option from [TocParameters](./toc.tocparameters.md) is false |
|  [element](./toc.toceventitemdetails.element.md) |  | HTMLElement | The DOM element that was transformed |
|  [id](./toc.toceventitemdetails.id.md) |  | string | The id of <code>element</code> or the "slugified" string from <code>textContent</code> |
|  [p?](./toc.toceventitemdetails.p.md) |  | HTMLParagraphElement | <i>(Optional)</i> The paragraph element inserted by the <code>toc</code> action unless the <code>anchored</code> option from [TocParameters](./toc.tocparameters.md) is either <code>false</code> or nonpositive |
|  [text](./toc.toceventitemdetails.text.md) |  | string | The <code>textContent</code> of <code>element</code> |
